title: TelnyxBrand

entityType.description: Entity type behind the brand. This is the form of business establishment.

cspId.title: Cspid
cspId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the csp by the registry.

brandId.title: Brandid
brandId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the brand.

tcrBrandId.title: TcrBrandid
tcrBrandId.description: Unique identifier assigned to the brand by the registry.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: Display or marketing name of the brand.

ein.title: Ein
ein.description: (Required for Non-profit) Government assigned corporate tax ID. EIN is 9-digits in U.S.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Valid phone number in e.164 international format.

state.title: State
state.description: State. Must be 2 letters code for United States.

postalCode.title: Postalcode
postalCode.description: Postal codes. Use 5 digit zipcode for United States

country.title: Country
country.description: ISO2 2 characters country code. Example: US - United States

email.title: Email
email.description: Valid email address of brand support contact.

ipAddress.title: Ipaddress
ipAddress.description: IP address of the browser requesting to create brand identity.

vertical.title: Vertical
vertical.description: Vertical or industry segment of the brand.

altBusinessId.title: Altbusinessid
altBusinessId.description: Alternate business identifier such as DUNS, LEI, or GIIN

universalEin.title: Universalein
universalEin.description: Universal EIN of Brand, Read Only.

referenceId.title: Referenceid
referenceId.description: Unique identifier Telnyx assigned to the brand - the brandId

mobilePhone.title: Mobilephone
mobilePhone.description: Valid mobile phone number in e.164 international format.

isReseller.title: Isreseller
isReseller.description: Indicates whether this brand is known to be a reseller

webhookURL.title: WebhookURL
webhookURL.description: Webhook to which brand status updates are sent.

businessContactEmail.title: BusinessContactEmail
businessContactEmail.description:
Business contact email.

Required if `entityType` is `PUBLIC_PROFIT`.

webhookFailoverURL.title: WebhookFailoverURL
webhookFailoverURL.description: Failover webhook to which brand status updates are sent.

createdAt.description: Date and time that the brand was created at.

updatedAt.description: Date and time that the brand was last updated at.

description: Telnyx-specific extensions to The Campaign Registry's `Brand` type
